content: with september leading the way into fall i m drawn to all things pumpkin-y and halloween-y so naturally i ve decided that all the toad fey need halloween costumes lol so whether you ve made a little toad familiar or you have a winged toad fairy or toad dragon this little witch or wizard hat and cape pattern will fit them all this hat and cape pattern is meant as a gift and a great big thank you to all those who ve purchased my toad familiar pattern thank you all so much for your support and your kind words and i hope you all have a very magical fall season and halloween toad familiar pattern can be found here - https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/toad-familiar-2
